sentences.en: After the police finds, archenemy, catch him immediately, regard as the major suspect sends Paris.
sentences.cn: 警察发觉后, 如临大敌, 马上把他抓起来, 当作重大嫌疑犯送到巴黎.

sentences.en: Conceit and complacency are the archenemy of unity.
sentences.cn: 骄傲自满是团结的大敌.

sentences.en: He actually made friends with his archenemy, Doune.
sentences.cn: 他竟同自己的死敌唐恩结成了朋友.

sentences.en: He says Tehran hopes to extend its influence beyond the Middle East, and that it is working with the Taliban, once its archenemy, against coalition forces in Afghanistan.
sentences.cn: 他说，德黑兰希望把影响力扩大到中东之外。 伊朗正在跟过去的主要敌人塔利班合作，对抗在阿富汗的联军力量。

sentences.en: Must remember: Is loaf is the beautiful archenemy!
sentences.cn: 要记住: 偷懒是美丽的大敌!

sentences.en: Stays up late is the skin health care archenemy.
sentences.cn: 熬夜是皮肤保健的大敌.

words.tran_cn: 主要敌人，大敌；撒旦，魔王

trans.tran_cn: 主要敌人，大敌，(A-)魔王，撒旦
